Articles.Content: Hello I have ben playing KSP for almost 2 years. I have just recently joined the forums although I have been reading it for a while.

Hello! Welcome to the forums!

Lots of good advice can be found here as well as a community with whom to share your KSP triumphs and tragedies.

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! Glad to see you've taken the plunge. Feel free to participate in anything that strikes your fancy.
